XData.name: KPI
XData.Description: Этот блок XData содержит определение KPI
XData.Data:
<kpi xmlns="http://www.intersystems.com/deepsee/kpi" name="NPMLBI/UkraineMapKPI" sourceType="sql" caption="">
<property name="Name" displayName="Район" columnNo="1"/> <property name="Color" displayName="Цвет" columnNo="2"/> <property name="Latitude" displayName="Широта" columnNo="3"/> <property name="Longitude" displayName="Долгота" columnNo="4"/> <property name="ParentName" displayName="Адм.ед. верхнего уровня" columnNo="5"/> <property name="DefaultZoom" displayName="Масштаб по умолчанию" columnNo="6"/> <property name="CanDrillDown" displayName="Возможность drill down" columnNo="7"/> <property name="Address" displayName="Адрес" columnNo="8"/> <property name="Level" displayName="Level" columnNo="9"/> <property name="TotalValue" displayName="TotalValue" columnNo="10"/> <property name="SpecialIcon" displayName="TotalValue" columnNo="11"/>
<filter name="LevelFilter" displayName="Родитель" defaultValue="0;-"/> <filter name="LevelStart" displayName="Начальный уровень" displayList="Регионы Украины,Области Украины" valueList="0,1" defaultValue="0"/> </kpi>

Method.name: %OnGetSQL

XData.name: sqlLevelZero
XData.Data:
<xml><![CDATA[ SELECT Name, 'rgb(' || Color || ',' || (255 - Color) ||',0)' As Color, NULL As Latitude, NULL As Longitude, ParentName, DefaultZoom, CanDrillDown, NULL As Address, "Level", TotalValue, NULL As SpecialIcon FROM ( SELECT Name, round((255 * (TotalValue - MIN(TotalValue))) / (MAX(TotalValue) - MIN(TotalValue) + 0.1), 0) As Color, ParentName, DefaultZoom, CanDrillDown, "Level", TotalValue FROM ( SELECT Name, ParentName, DefaultZoom, CanDrillDown, "Level", ( SELECT SUM(TotalValue) FROM ( SELECT (SELECT SUM(td.Value) FROM NPMLBI.TestData As td WHERE td.UKR->ParentName = FirstLevel.Name) As TotalValue FROM NPMLBI.UkraineMap As FirstLevel WHERE "Level" = 1 AND ParentName = ZeroLevel.Name ) ) As TotalValue
FROM NPMLBI.UkraineMap As ZeroLevel WHERE "Level" = 0 ) ) ]]></xml>

XData.name: sqlLevelOne
XData.Data: <xml><![CDATA[ SELECT Name, 'rgb(' || Color || ',' || (255 - Color) ||',0)' As Color, NULL As Latitude, NULL As Longitude, ParentName, DefaultZoom, CanDrillDown, NULL As Address, "Level", TotalValue, NULL As SpecialIcon FROM ( SELECT Name, round((255 * (TotalValue - MIN(TotalValue))) / (MAX(TotalValue) - MIN(TotalValue) + 0.1), 0) As Color, Latitude, Longitude, ParentName, DefaultZoom, CanDrillDown, Address, "Level", TotalValue FROM ( SELECT Name, Latitude, Longitude, ParentName, DefaultZoom, CanDrillDown, Address, "Level", (SELECT SUM(td.Value) FROM NPMLBI.TestData As td WHERE td.UKR->ParentName = ukr.Name) As TotalValue FROM NPMLBI.UkraineMap As ukr WHERE "Level" = 1 :parentNameCondition ) ) ]]></xml>

XData.name: sqlLevelTwo
XData.Data: <xml><![CDATA[ SELECT Name, NULL As Color, Latitude, Longitude, ParentName, DefaultZoom, CanDrillDown, Address, "Level", (SELECT td.Value FROM NPMLBI.TestData As td WHERE td.UKR->Name = ukr.Name) As TotalValue, MainCity As SpecialIcon FROM NPMLBI.UkraineMap As ukr WHERE "Level" = 2 AND ParentName = ':parentName' ]]></xml>
